none: DIGITAL: Cushing Memorial Library and Archives
Hoefnagel's plan of London from Braun and Hogenburg's Civitates orbis terrarum, 1572
1 map ; 33 x 49 centimeters, on sheet 57 x 74 centimeters, in cover 79 x 58 centimeters
Hoefnagel's plan of London from Braun and Hogenburg's Civitates orbis terrarum, 1572
DIGITAL: Cushing Memorial Library and Archives

Includes illustrations; Pictorial maps;  "The Typographic Etching Co. Ph. Sc.t."; "Shews St. Paul's with its spire, which was destroyed in 1561. Presumably, therefore, the original plan was drawn before that date"; Reproduced for the London Topographical Society by Chiswick Press; Latin text, place names in English; Scale on original print map [ca. 1:242]; Facsimile. Originally published: London : Braun and Hogenberg, 1572
